fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu

Class ControlRequestGeneratorOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractPort
      • fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
        • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.cpu.ControlRequestGeneratorOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlRequestArrivalI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI, fr.upmc.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.upmc.components.ports.PortI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ControlRequestGeneratorOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements ControlRequestArrivalI
    The class ControlRequestGeneratorOutboundPort implements the outbound port for a given component.

    Description

    The port implements the ControlRequestArrivalI interface as required and upon a call, passes it to the connector that must also implement the same interface.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 23 nov. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
